info.name: Apache Detection
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some Apache servers have the version on the response header. The OpenSSL version can be also obtained

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: reseaupro.unpidf.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.0 200 OK Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0 Connection: close Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Wed, 13 Oct 2021 10:35:07 GMT Expires: Thu, 19 Nov 1981 08:52:00 GMT Pragma: no-cache Server: Apache/2.2.22 (Debian) Set-Cookie: symfony=itgsrn56o2d437os4pk4vft013; path=/ Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Powered-By: PHP/5.4.45-0+deb7u2 Réseau professionnel - Entreprises
